snippet: Sandra Fluke, who was subjected to degrading comments by Rush Limbaugh after she tried to testify in Congress about insurance coverage for contraceptives, is running for a seat in the State Senate.
abstract: Lawyer Sandra Fluke, Democrat, will seek California State Senate seat representing some of most affluent sections of Los Angeles County; Fluke gained national attention after being denied chance to testify before a congressional committee about wanting her college's health plan to cover contraceptives, and was subsequently subjected to degrading comments by Rush Limbaugh.
lead_paragraph: Sandra Fluke, who was subjected to degrading comments by Rush Limbaugh after she tried to testify in Congress about insurance coverage for contraceptives, is running for a seat in the State Senate.

headline.main: Once Targeted by Limbaugh, Lawyer Seeks California Seat
headline.print_headline: Once Targeted by Limbaugh, Lawyer Seeks California Seat
